Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

After i just had to abort - i mean, ending as planned... oh who am i kidding my rocket crashed into the ocean just next to the KSC. Note to self, fuel ducts should not end on a strut. Anyways, i have been playing for a while now and finally got around to registering here on the forums.

Looking forward to fun times discussing the game, the universe and everything with all of you,

Mario

(disclaimer: not the jumping plumber, no matter how many times you ask about Luigi )
